Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.11041/218/2007-Admn Dated: 03.03.2016 PQLICY MATERS-IechnicaL (201/2016) Decision_ on File_NoNHAIRoad Safety-FQBL2OL 62 Sub: Providing Foot Over (FoB) at accident prone site on NHAI stretches. Lack of crossing facilities for pedestrians are one of the leading cause of fatalities on the NHs. Accordingly, it has been decided with the approval of the Competent Authority to provide crossing facilities on NH wherever required. Furtheer to Fimplify the procedure; the power for approval of FOB under CoS Upfo Rs: 80 lakh & Rs. Crore for 4 & 6 laning respectively is hereby delegated to Regionai Office subject to following RO shall identify requirement and locations of FoB in consultation with elected representative of the area/project director/Police Officer /Road Safety Officer ii) RO shall provide FOBs in the ongoing projects under minimum   safety requirement as a change of scope. iii) Costing will be based on current SOR of the State and it shall follow standard drawings of the FOB which are being provided separately. iv) While providing the FOB, closure of median opening should also be explored: The work of FOBs shall be completed by 30.09.2016 (A.K.
